程序包 main.controller

类 GameEndController

java.lang.Object
main.controller.GameEndController
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameEndController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The GameEndController class contains several useful class fields and methods. This controller class is specified to control gameEnd.fxml. It will be instantiated during the fxml file loading process.

Function saveRecord(MouseEvent) and finishGame(MouseEvent) are the main functions to save user records and restart the game.

  • 方法详细资料

    • finishGame

      void finishGame​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Close the prompted window asking users to enter user name and save records. Switch the showing scene to the game-start scene.
      参数:
      event - mouse event passed when the button is clicked

    • saveRecord

      void saveRecord​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      save the records in /resources/record.txt file. The methods will automatically create a one if the file not exists or write to the existing file. It will first iterate through the record.txt file to check whether the completed map set has had records before. If not, the currently saving record will be the first record for this map set. Therefore, the methods should write the map set name to the record.txt file. If it already has some records, the currently saving records will be inserted the next line of the map set name.
      参数:
      event - mouse event passed when the button is clicked
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if game file is not saved successfully

    • initData

      public void initData​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String mapSetName, int moveCount)
      Received the message sent by GameRunningController.startGameEndScene(). Set the message to be displayed. Use the mapSetName and moveCount for saving game records.
      参数:
      message - the sentence will displayed
      mapSetName - map set name of current game file
      moveCount - total move count for the user

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      指定者:
      initialize 在接口中 javafx.fxml.Initializable
